message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid further delays and losses from inflation.
Alice, your initial offer was a bit skewed in your favor. Let's be practical - I'm proposing a 60/40 split.  This reflects the fact that inflation hits you harder than me.  Let's settle this now.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is too far in your favor. Let's meet in the middle at 55/45 and end this.
